p: After 4 h of incubation ( Figure 4), ascorbic acid did not induce hemolysis at the evaluated concentrations. The EEB and EEL showed a pattern similar to that of the control ascorbic acid, not inducing hemolysis at lower concentrations. However, they induced hemolysis at concentrations of >25 μg/mL in EEB and >100 μg/mL in EEL.
